Advanced EAST Text Detector¶

class mira.detectors.AdvancedEAST(annotation_config=None, input_shape=(None, None, 3), pretrained_backbone=True, pretrained_top=False, text_category='text')[source]¶

A detector wrapping the Advanced EAST Text Detector. The original code was ported over. The pretrained weights also originate from the linked repository. This version of EAST is expected to perform better on longer text boxes relative to the input image.

Parameters

  • annotation_config – The annotation configuration to use for detection. It must contain text as one of the categories.

  • input_shape – Tuple of (height, width, n_channels)

  • pretrained_backbone – Whether to use a pretrained backbone for the model

  • pretrained_top – Whether to use the pretrained full model.

  • text_category – The name of the category to use for labeling text.

model¶

The underlying model

backbone¶

The backbone for the model (i.e., VGG16)
